#Text=Morgan 's Bay
#Text=The seaside village of Morgan 's Bay is located on the Eastern Cape Wild Coast of South Africa and is about 85 km east of East London .
#Text=Morgan 's Bay lies between the famous Morgan 's Bay cliffs and a mile-long stretch of unspoilt beach , bordered by the Cape Morgan Nature Reserve .
#Text=In the early part of the century , Morgan 's Bay was a popular holiday destination for farmers from throughout South Africa 's Eastern Cape region .
#Text=Every year , after the harvest , they packed their families and possessions into wagons for a camping holiday by the sea .
#Text=These days Morgan 's Bay is still a popular camping destination , with families from up country making the yearly trek down to the sea to enjoy the delights of the Wild Coast .
#Text=Get in
#Text=Situated 10 minutes away from the Kei River and the adventures of the Wild Coast , and 45 minutes from the modern amenities of East London .
#Text=Directions from East London :
#Text=Drive North-East along the N2 highway from East London , take the Kei Mouth / Morgan Bay turnoff at Mooiplaas and follow the R349 for 35.5 km .
#Text=Turn right at Morgan Bay turnoff and follow the road for 7 km until you reach Morgan Bay .
#Text=Directions from Durban :
#Text=Drive South from Durban along the N2 highway , 31 km past the Kei River Bridge
#Text=turn left at the Kei Mouth / Morgan Bay turnoff at Mooiplaas and follow the R349 for 35.5 km .
#Text=Turn right at Morgan Bay turnoff and follow the road for 7 km until you reach Morgan Bay
#Text=Get around
#Text=There are no buses or taxis in Morgan 's Bay .
#Text=See
#Text=If you 're a keen hiker it 's worth a ramble over the Morgan 's Bay Cliffs .
#Text=These impressive slabs of dolerite , which drop some 50 m into the pounding surf , are ideal vantage points for watching the sunset .
#Text=If you 're lucky , you may even see the dolphins frolicking in the waves , which crash against the rocks below .
#Text=Do

#Text=Morgan 's Bay is an ideal destination for adventurous family holidays with an excellent swimming beach , patrolled by lifeguards during the festive season , and lagoon in pristine natural surroundings .
#Text=It 's the perfect place to get in some well earned relaxation and breathe in the fresh sea air .
#Text=During the day you can gaze at passing ships on the horizon or lie on the beach with a book .
#Text=At night
#Text=you can lie relaxed in comfortable accommodation while being hypnotised by the dull roar of the sea , glorious stars and the intermittent beam of the Cape Morgan Lighthouse across the bay .
#Text=Mkulu Kei Horse Trails ( Cheradon ) , ☏ +2783 632-7298 .
#Text=Mkulu Kei Horse Trails
#Text=Cher-a-Don was established in 1998 and provides guided horse trekking vacations along the Wild Coast of South Africa .
#Text=Riding tours are available from ~2-hour beach rides , full day rides , as well as 2- to 12-day over-night multi-day riding trails .
#Text=Multi-day tours are flexible .
#Text=Wild Coast Horse Trails , Sunray Farm
#Text=Kei Mouth Road
#Text=Wild Coast , ☏ +2782 567-0972 .
#Text=Offers a full holiday experience while giving you the chance to sample the undeveloped beauty of the South African Wild Coast .
#Text=The beach
#Text=riding along the Transkei is exhilarating and exciting .
#Text=Torstone Sport Horses are competitive endurance horses and high quality pleasure riding horses .
#Text=Buy
#Text=Xhosa Crafts .
#Text=Xhosa women sell beads and other crafts under the trees near the lagoon .
#Text=Craft Markets , ☏ +2743 841-1598 .
#Text=Local Farmers & Craft Markets are held once a month and regularly during holiday periods .
#Text=They are advertised on the notice board at the Top Shop .
#Text=The Sandhoppa , 41 Beach Road ( Morgan Bay Hotel ) , ☏ +2743 841-1062 .
#Text=Forgotten your slip slops , sun hat or sun block in the rush to get here ?
#Text=The Sandhoppa offers popular brands including Roxy , Haviannas , Quicksilver and Billabong .
#Text=Eat
#Text=The Deck , 41 Beach Road ( Morgan Bay Hotel ) , ☏ +2743 841-1062 .
#Text=Enjoy a choice of breakfast , lunch , tea and dinner menu options .
#Text=Meals can be enjoyed as a take-away or eat in .
#Text=Relax and enjoy the 180-degree view of the Indian Ocean while you eat .
#Text=The Krans Kombuis restaurant and bar , The Mitford Lodge , Beach Road , ☏ +2743 841-1510 .
#Text=Situated on the seafront to provide dining guests with uninterrupted views of the waves and krantzes .

#Text=Dining at the Mitford Lodge includes sumptuous meals that range from table de hote to an à la carte menu with meals that include seafood platters , deliciously prepared ribs , steak and Italian cuisine .
#Text=The Mudhutters , Link Road , Morgan Bay , ☏ +2743 841-1810 .

#Text=Open school holidays , long weekends and other times by arrangement for homebakes , homemade jams , pickles , pestos , chilli sauces , etc. , Tea , cake and light meals served in our indigenous riverine forest garden .
#Text=Guided walks with Picnic Lunch .
#Text=Come and braai , they supply every Friday evening .
#Text=Had a hectic week ?
#Text=Relax on their deck with an ice cold beer .
#Text=They can even braai for you .
#Text=Braai packs , salads and extra goodies supplied .
#Text=5 km from Morgan 's Bay
#Text=Budget
#Text=Cane Castle ( Self Catering ) , Beach Road , ☏ +2745 839-4817 .
#Text=Cane Castle is a double story beach house comprising 2 self-contained units and is located within a 1 minute walk of the beach .
#Text=Sleeps 6 & 12 .
#Text=From R400 per night .
#Text=DoubleView ( Bed & Breakfast ) , 127 Yellowwood Place , ☏ +2743 841-1142 .
#Text=Newly built , spacious modern home with two large , luxurious bedrooms each with en-suite bathroom .
#Text=One bedroom has a view of the lagoon and sea , the other the indigenous forest .
#Text=From R300 pp sharing .
#Text=The Lower Deck ( Self Catering ) , 470 Chestnut Place , ☏ +2743 841-1099 .
#Text=Situated in a quiet cul de sac , approximately 200 m from the waters edge , The Lower Deck sits a top a hill and is blessed with beautiful sea views .
#Text=From R400 per night .
#Text=The Morgan Bay Bed & Breakfast , Beach Road , ☏ +2743 841-1125 .
#Text=A charming old colonial home , situated in a beautiful garden , with the beach and safe swimming lagoon at the bottom of the garden path .
#Text=From R300pps .
#Text=Patty 's Place ( Self Catering ) , Candleberry Place , ☏ +2743 841-1245 .
#Text=Patty 's Place comprises three self-catering units and is located in a quiet cul-de-sac close to the shop and a short walk from the beach .
#Text=R500 per night .
#Text=Tanglewood House ( Self Catering ) , Tanglewood Drive , ☏ +2743 841-1031 .
#Text=Tanglewood House sleeps up to 6 people and is a thatch house set in a lush green belt , a 2 min drive or 10 min walk from the Morgan Bay beach .
#Text=From R480 .
#Text=Yellowwood Forest ( Caravan and Camping ) , Link Road , ☏ +2743 841-1598 , ✉ info@yellowwoodforest.co.za .
#Text=Family friendly Caravan Park & Campsite situated in woodland just above the Morgan 's Bay Lagoon .
#Text=We have plenty of shade and are sheltered from the wind .
#Text=From R85/site plus R10pp .
